name: Prisons and Zombies
description:
There's a zombie outbreak in prison! As the sole survivor you have taken refuge on a roof and is awaiting pickup by helicopter. Unfortunately, zombies are pouring in, the rope ladder is too short and the helicopter can't land, so you'll have to pile and climb the dead bodies to escape.

Created as part of the International Educations Game Jam.

CONTROLS:
Movement: WASD
Jump: SPACE
Shoot: Left Mouse Button
Throw Body: Right Mouse Button

TEAM
